availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p: At a county Court called and held for Barren County on Monday the 24th day of Febry 1862 the following order was made:

"Ordered that James M Payne be recommended to the Governor as Suitable person to fill the office of Magistrate for the Glasgow District in place of R R H Gillock who has vacated his office by accepting an office under the so called Confederate Government"

a copy att
Travis Cockrill C B C C
And at a court begun and held for Barren County on Monday March 17th 1862 the following orders were made:
"Ordered that John Lock be recommended to the Governor as a suitable person to receive the appointment of magistrate in Sartain precinct in place of Joshua N Garmon resigned"

"Ordered that Thos. S. Walton be recommended to the Governor as a suitable person to receive the appointment of maigstrate in the Goosehorn District in place of R N Field, he having accepted office under the provisional Government and has left the county"

Ordered that Joseph P Taylor be recommended to the Governor as a suitable person to receive the appointment of magistrate in Tracy precinct
in place of J R Bean, he having accepted office under the provisional Government;

"Ordered that Andrew Marshall be recommended to the Governor as a suitable person for the office of magistrate in the Sanders precinct in place of B. G. Smith, he having accepted office under the provisional Govermnent"

copies att
Travis Cockrill C B C C

Barren Co
J. P.
Com Issd Apr 24. 1862
